bow: help with baby names some background information my family has tradition of using different girl names for every generation they are ann leigh and helen or variants of the family legend goes we have been using these names for about 000 yrs beginning in ancient greece with helena ann getting added sometime down the line and leigh coming in last when we emigrated to england anyway ever since was child and made aware of the tradition picked out annabelle grace as how would honour the tradition am leigh my mother is leigh and my grandmother and greatgrandmother were ann so thought it would be nice to go back to ann plus personally do like helen just never liked the sound of it am now pregnant with my first child and my brother wife was also pregnant with their first child they just had their baby few days ago and guess what her name was annebelle jane guess should ve seen it coming and had talk with them about baby names since we re all very traditional and wish to continue the tradition am trying to be happy for them and excited about my new niece but it was like blow to my stomach when first heard her name it feels distressing after imagining my baby girl for so many years to realise ll never call her my sweet annabelle know hormonal and this is not the end of the world and should calm down but every time try to come up with new name end up in tears we still have months until my due date so we have some time to find new name and get used to it am hoping you guys can help me come with some new names that use ann or leigh or both of them my husband has suggested just naming her annabelle grace anyway since wanted that name so much but saw the fights between my mother and my aunt when was young over baby names for my sisters and cousins and really do want repeat of that in this generation nor do want to fight with my brother and his wonderful wife so mommit please help me hannalei or annalei there are variations to the spellings too think they sound lovely knew the sweetest girl in college named hannalei she pronounced it hah na lay and it combines both anne and leigh it just sucks that your long favourite name was taken think its completely fine to be sad about it have you considered helene hel een not crazy about helen either but it cool alternative and it seems like there been few generations without helen you could make her middle name annabelle and call her that instead of her first name ve known lots of people in my life who went by their middle name it would be so bad to have people clarify leigh annabelle when family is discussing the little one had this happen to me was pregnant and we were hoping for boy my ex and always loved the name alexander and wanted to have james as middle name for my father was talking to my ex sister in law about this we were both pregnant and excited she just smiled and said it was cute name fast forward several months had miscarriage was 15 weeks when miscarried and messaged me to tell me she had her son his name alexander james was heartbroken so know that feeling alex is now years old and he very cute little boy sometimes it makes me upset but now it not big deal there are other names and other things can do to honor my father but to the names helena helene annalise annaleigh joanna alanna leighanna lianna leigha ansleigh ashleigha brileigh or kyleigh there is also alianna which happens to be my youngest name actually that all can really think of hope everything works out for you and know you will find name that is even more beautiful than the name you had chosen hannah elena leeanne elaine analena did actually consider helena as return to the very start of the tradition but ultimately decided still did like it and helen returned to the family in full force with my little sister and my cousins that actually what the fight was about with my mother and aunt my mother had picked out helen ann for my sister since she wanted all three names in our family but unfortunately my aunt also wanted the same name since they are both very stubborn it lead to incredibly silly and huge fights and became basically birthing race since they had become pregnant within few weeks of each other result is have cousin named helen ann and sister begrudgingly named ann helen who goes by her middle name my mother is very stubborn yes keep telling myself it silly but right now feel heartbroken and feel foolish for feeling heartbroken since really nothing tragic has happened so sad to hear you had the same story although even worse than mine think it just sucks to have your heart set on something only for it to be dashed at the last moment really like annalise as it sounds wonderfully sweet think might build upon that by looking up some nice middle names little glad my family names suck and have really been passed on except in weird ways my mom was named after her dad was named after my mom uncle by marriage when considering names for our son it was pretty easy to go lol no to dale gary rademir wayne tony and jerry one upside of helene or helena is lena as nickname it tribute while also stepping little outside of the same three names best of luck in your decision my name is hannah lea guess should ve clarified up in the post but was quite sure how to put it my mother and are both lea lee rather than just leigh my mother picked mine because at first she tried to combine all three names and thought it sounded lovely too it does suck but really should ve thought about having talk with my brother and his wife first since the range is somewhat limited just never thought they ve would ve picked such feminine name since they are both very sporty and his wife only mentioned that she liked kate because it so simple oh well hindsight 20 20 leanne annabella ashleigh leighla leila ainsleigh hayleigh brayleigh am glad that the boys in our family do have any naming traditions half hoping now that our baby will be boy we decided not to know the sex and wait and see since it give more time to adjust one advantage of the naming tradition is that it does make extended family reunions interesting and confusing especially when all the little girls get together and realise that they all have similar names it led to meltdown few years ago when 3yr old realised that she was not the only anne in the world mummy she says her name is ann yup you guys have the same name but mummy anne well yes but you re anne with an she ann with no and this is your big cousin anna with an and over there is your aunty annie and here is baby anne but mummy anne they re not anne they stole my name well sweetie sometimes people have the same name no they stole it hate them annette marianne leanne annalisa anna deleted my sister ruined the name had picked for my daughter happens and honestly prefer her name much better now maybe you ll have boy and have girl later down the road when you can use annabelle again but if you do have sweet little girl was going to highly recommend annalise as well also few others for suggestion annabeth annis annette annora anastasia angeline angelique anniston and the alternate spellings annistyn anistyn aniston etc anjelica ann elizabeth my daughter name and also other double names ann margaret ann marie anna katherine etc and ansleigh ansley why not use leigh or version of it for the first name and annabelle as the middle name that way you can still call her your little annabelle so sorry this happened can imagine how heartbroken you are and would feel the same that being said all for living your dream but if it going to cause fights it up to you whether or not you want to fight them good luck with whatever you decide what about helin pronounced hey lynn my sister named her second daughter that after her mother in law who is finnish lily ann or even lilianne with the same pronunciation or annaleigh would be nice you can still name her annabelle they are cousins not sisters yall do live together so there wo be any confusion on day to day basis do it she your baby name her want you want my daughter is elaina wanted elena nicknamed lainey leni as chosen by my hubsand remember though your baby your choice meh we have the same problem with our traditional boy names we just named them the same and use their middle names when we fuss at them at thanksgiving it no big deal just name the girl annabel heleigh anne combo of helen and leigh are you by any chance tamora pierce fan lol am too annalise love ainsleigh good suggestion also like the sound of annalee or anna lee what about annalynn if it sounds too similar to your niece name and becomes an issue then might have conversation with your brother and sister in law about how you had picked annabelle originally but did feel right about keeping it once you found out they had chosen the same name good luck this happens all too often when siblings or cousins have kids around the same time my husband cousin picked the name we would have chosen if we had boy and it stung we ended up having girl but if we have boy down the line we ll talk to her about using the name since it family name on my side leah is pretty my vote is for annalise gt my husband has suggested just naming her annabelle grace anyway since wanted that name so much do this here why it normal for names to repeat in families within generations *and even within siblings* your family has an even stronger custom for doing this chances are one girl will be known as annie and the other bella or similar annabelle grace is not identical to annebelle jane you ve loved this name forever *use the name you love* if you really ca bring yourself to do this suggest annaliese hailey and hayley are popular spellings here uk think you should keep the name my daughter is emma ree and her younger cousin is emma rae sounds like ray you can always give her nickname ileana is italian for helen did they know you were going to pick annabelle and they poached the name from you anyway name her annabelle grace if you want to so what if their names are almost the same she your kid if your family are going to fight and be jerks about it let em that their baggage to deal with where does your brother live does he live close if not see no problem with still using annabelle agree with lovethekak in that they re cousins so it not too big of deal also you may choose different nicknames to use for the girls so it may be less of an issue then you re thinking it may be good luck mama in the fisher families its not uncommon to have brother and sister and father with the same name the first born boy is to have his dads first name but when they get girl first they hedge bets and give her the girl variant then having 1st boy after gets daddys name still lots of andrea and andrew or wilma willina and williams ect just name her annabelle personally not fan of naming traditions as think kids deserve to have name that sets them apart you did ask my opinion on that though just wanted to suggest lilianna grace good luck friend of mine named her daughter analeigh think it is beautiful name it different but still classic second this have girl name very attached to and no amount of name duplication would stop me from using it now just have to have girl next time deleted you ve got several good options including sticking with the original hope you are happy with whatever you decide because it is fairly relevant give you this song http www youtube com watch v=ogwbye58ajk oh dear everyone is really getting me all pumped up and feeling like can do it think ll sleep on it for few days or weeks let my brother and his wife enjoy their new baby before bringing it up if they do get upset about it at least now have plethora of wonderful and lovely names to fall back on all very good reasons you guys are really convincing me that naming them the same wo be so bad just worried now they might feel like stealing it even after explain myself personally go with some variation of helen because annabelle is so popular right now it great to have traditions but she wo care that her name is traditional if she knows about 20 other ann ish names my name is emily so know how much that sucks and had my heart set on liam for long time until it exploded this year and did want my son to suffer my fate also everybody told me this and did believe them but it ended up being true sometimes your kid just does look like *insert name here* we had the name flynn waiting in the wings and when he came out they asked me his name and albeit was still in shock but he did not look like liam he looked like flynn over the years ve flip flopped back and forth on whether to carry on the tradition it does limit creativity and individuality if followed too strictly but it also gives wonderful sense of connection throughout the centuries look through my family tree books and see all these strong interesting women with my name can tell little of their personality from how they followed the tradition with their own children or if they did follow it at all some modernized their daughters names some used the ancient forms some got creative and one mother had helens she must ve loved the name or been too tired to choose new one like for my daughter to feel that sense of connection too ultimately for myself ve decided to honour the tradition with my first daughter and then get creative with any other girls might have thinking maybe quinn or kadlin or ishka for my second daughter but anyway lilianna grace is wonderful alternative ll add it to my short list thank you absolutely understand how upset you are concerning your recent name napping but there are so many wonderful names related to helen ann and leigh you re really lucky with to have theses as core names names related to helen family tree http www behindthename com name helen tree names related to helen list http www behindthename com name helen related names related to ann family tree http www behindthename com name ann tree names related to ann list http www behindthename com name ann related names related to leigh list http www behindthename com name leigh related also the people on the nameberry forums are amazing with this kind of thing if you re looking for any more help or support http nameberry com nametalk forum php know it probably wo help but please try to also consider that your baby girl may not look or feel like an annabelle grace and you would have ended up with completely different name anyway hope some of this is helpful in some way adore this name if did know of them already in my generation it would have been top of my list if we had daughter they will feel like you re stealing unless you explain yourself why not talk to them now and see how they would feel about it aww what nice answer all your reasons are just as valid if not more valid than my point of view oh wow this is incredibly helpful everyone here has convinced me that giving her the original name wo be so bad ve decided to have chat with my brother and sister in law in few days or weeks after they ve had time to settle in and see what they think if they get upset or do agree then now have great resource to fall back on thanks so much well you did raise point that ve been considering for many years just gave you quick run through of how ve ultimately reconciled my conflicting feelings name her annabelle grace anyway why do people put so much on name it just name there are thousands and annebelles do what you want and if your sil has an issue just remind her how many people share her same name it just name it does define who you are huge tamora pierce fan you know the greek form of helen is eleni personally like that rather better than straight helen also knew woman from kenya called elinah eh lee nah which is also form of helen but one with lee in the middle how about annalise belle then you can shorten it to annabelle at home wanted liam so bad when my son was born we were in recovery trying to decide it was at that last moment knew had to let go of liam it was just too popular now it cool though he totally grant not liam my cousin named his son blake not too long ago his sister in law remarried guy with son named blake now the two blakes go by their middle names when they are together andrew and mario it works for them you can totally have two annabelle and use middle names to tell them apart also love the suggestions annaleigh and annalise awesome now know did not suffer alone deleted my brother and cousin have the same name it never been an issue give your baby the name you love though have to say annalise is beautiful name think you could still go with annabelle but if you need alternatives how about anni na it pretty common name in finland but propably not in us know an annella an anacelia and believe it or not an annalea which you could spell annaleigha just please do drop an on that last one edit you could also try leanne maybe spell it leighann edit aleah aleanna deleted yep agree she ll probably get all butt hurt but ya know what your neice wont be the only annabelle on the planet her name is bound to the same as another child sure you ll get some grief over it but tough luck for them its your child and you love the name perhaps you can let everyone know now so they have time to get use to concept if you kept it secret until your annabelle was born you might have to deal with hurt feelings all at once deleted well my go to is always www behindthename com here is list of all female names on the site beginning with ann*
